content:
Armathys may go to various places in pursuit of his goals, depending on what those goals are. Here are a few possibilities:

1. Shadowfell: Armathys may seek out the Shadowfell, the dark and ominous realm from which his people hail, in an attempt to better understand his connection to the Raven Queen and the curse that plagues him.
2. Cities or towns: Armathys may travel to cities or towns to find work as an assassin, hone his skills, and build his reputation. He may also seek out information or contacts that could help him achieve his goals.
3. Dungeon or ruins: Armathys may seek out ancient dungeons or ruins in search of powerful magic items or knowledge that could aid him in his endeavors.
4. Battlefields or war zones: Armathys may go to places where conflict is rife, as he believes that it is the best place to hone his combat skills and make a name for himself as a fearsome warrior.

Ultimately, where Armathys goes will depend on his goals and the opportunities that present themselves to him. As the player, you have the ability to shape your character's journey, so feel free to experiment and see what works best for you and your character.
